meanings.sent1: The superhero had a muscled physique that impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder had a muscled chest and arms from working out.
meanings.sent3: The muscled wrestler easily lifted his opponent over his head.
meanings.sent4: The muscled lion effortlessly tackled its prey in the wild.
meanings.sent5: Her muscled legs propelled her to victory in the race.

meanings.definition: To use one's muscles to move or lift something heavy.
meanings.sent1: He muscled the heavy box onto the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: She muscled through the crowd to reach the front of the line.
meanings.sent3: The little boy muscled the door open with all his strength.
meanings.sent4: The team muscled their way to victory in the intense match.
meanings.sent5: The workers muscled the heavy equipment into place at the construction site.
